text:
gem の metadata に github_repo を設定すると、1つのリポジトリから複数の gem 上げられるみたいです
<https://docs.github.com/en/packages/using-github-packages-with-your-projects-ecosystem/configuring-rubygems-for-use-with-github-packages#publishing-multiple-packages-to-the-same-repository>

attachments.fallback: Configuring RubyGems for use with GitHub Packages - GitHub Docs
attachments.title: Configuring RubyGems for use with GitHub Packages - GitHub Docs
attachments.text: You can configure RubyGems to publish a package to GitHub Packages and to use packages stored on GitHub Packages as dependencies in a Ruby project with Bundler.

root.text: gem は同名じゃないとダメみたいで複数 gem を生成する repository で使えなくて困っている…。
